name: Virus Rush (itch)
description:
Project for the UNSW Game Jam Competition

A quirky little 2D game where you play as bat that has a virus, and you try to spread the disease amongst a population.

Along the journey you will be chased by doctors that try to stop the spread of the disease.

The cheat button is used to add some new game play mechanics on the controllable character.

Full screen causes text to be misplaced.
